summary: An simple fomod menu for install the helpfull mod: "Awesome Apiaries - Retextured Beehive Apiary".
descriptionHtml:
[center]Its simple... in the NEXUS me found the mod for FIX the original ugly-Bethesda-textures of [i]Beehive Apiary[/i].


The mod, you can found, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66263/?]HERE[/url] [i][color=red]<--- at moment the MOD is hidden, contact the autor!

The reason given by the author is: [i]I've retired from modding. Anyone is free to share this or any of my mods in
anyway they want, modify, repackage, convert, or otherwise. Please do not make money off it in anyway though.

[/i][/color][/i][color=red]If need the mod and dont want hurt the author contact me...[/color][i][color=red][/color][/i]


[b]For use my fomod menu:[/b]

FIRST STEP - download the main files of[size=2][i] Awesome Apiaries - Retextured Beehive Apiary [/i][/size]from the link,

SECOND STEP - download my fomod menu from FILES label in this mod page
(the file is .zip and you can use default windows file explorer),

THIRD STEP - combine the two folders structures in one .zip file, if change the structure, the fomod don't work
(and add in your mod manager the .zip file combined).


Now you can save your time each time you use this mod!


[b]ENJOY


[/b]- - -[/center]


[b]Font used in image:[/b] [i]PostScriptum Light[/i] - Free to use licence

[b]Notes:[/b]

 - The copyright free font is sent to your email address.
 - For questions or requests write to levi@loremipsum.ro[/size]

Thank you, "Levi" (the "NAME OF AUTOR" of font in page image)
author: Marco Colonna TOVOT
